TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAsyncResult

span.span: Represents the status of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口由包含可异步操作的方法的类实现。The interface is implemented by classes containing methods that can operate asynchronously. 它是启动异步操作，如方法的返回类型，并将它传递到方法，结束异步操作，如。It is the return type of methods that initiate an asynchronous operation, such as , and it is passed to methods that conclude an asynchronous operation, such as . 对象还传递给调用的方法委托的异步操作完成时。 objects are also passed to methods invoked by delegates when an asynchronous operation completes. 支持的对象，接口存储异步操作的状态信息，并提供要允许在操作完成时要发出信号的线程的同步对象。An object that supports the interface stores state information for an asynchronous operation and provides a synchronization object to allow threads to be signaled when the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > 类是实现返回的`BeginInvoke`方法时使用委托来以异步方式调用的方法。The class is the implementation of that is returned by the `BeginInvoke` method when you use a delegate to call a method asynchronously. 有关详细说明如何接口使用，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)主题。For a detailed description of how the interface is used, see the [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) topic. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来获取，以及如何在委托上等待的异步调用。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to get a , and how to wait for an asynchronous call on a delegate. 当异步调用完成时 会收到信号，而你可以通过调用 方法来等待它。The is signaled when the asynchronous call completes, and you can wait for it by calling the method. 此示例由两个类组成： 包含以异步方式调用的方法和包含的类的类`Main`进行调用的方法。The example consists of two classes: the class that contains the method that is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关详细信息和使用委托来以异步方式调用方法的更多示例，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/waithandle.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/waithandle.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/WaitHandle.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AsyncState As Object
public: property System::Object ^ AsyncState { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个用户定义的对象，该对象限定或包含有关异步操作的信息。

span.span: Gets a user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.

value.span: 一个用户定义的对象，限定或包含有关异步操作的信息。

span.span: A user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的对象的启动异步操作的方法的最后一个参数。This property returns the object that is the last parameter of the method that initiates an asynchronous operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于将信息传递给回调方法。The following code example demonstrates how the property is used to pass information to a callback method. 最后一个参数`BeginInvoke`方法调用是一个格式字符串，该回调方法用来设置输出消息的格式。The last parameter of the `BeginInvoke` method call is a format string, which the callback method uses to format an output message. 此示例由两个类组成： 包含以异步方式调用的方法和包含的类的类`Main`进行调用的方法。The example consists of two classes: the class that contains the method that is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关此回调示例的工作原理的详细信息和使用委托来以异步方式调用方法的更多示例，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information about how this callback example works, and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/callback.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/callback.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/callback.vb#5)]

para.span: 实现此属性以允许异步操作的调用方以获取该操作开始时指定的应用程序定义的对象。

span.span: Implement this property to allow the caller of an asynchronous operation to obtain an application-defined object specified at the start of the operation.

para.span: 可以使用此对象将传递到的异步操作的状态信息您提供的。

span.span: This object can be used to pass state information for the asynchronous operation to an that you provide.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AsyncWaitHandle As WaitHandle
public: property System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ AsyncWaitHandle { System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于等待异步操作完成的 。

span.span: Gets a that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.

value.span: 用于等待异步操作完成的 。

span.span: A that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值，则允许客户端时要等待的异步操作以完成而不是轮询直至操作结束。The return value allows the client to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete instead of polling until the operation concludes. 返回值可用于执行， ，或操作。The return value can be used to perform a , , or operation. 公共语言运行时提供了大量可等待对象，如， ，和，所有这些镜像 Win32 同步基元。The common language runtime supplies a number of waitable objects, such as , , and , all of which mirror Win32 synchronization primitives. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来获取，以及如何在委托上等待的异步调用。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to get a , and how to wait for an asynchronous call on a delegate. 当异步调用完成时 会收到信号，而你可以通过调用 方法来等待它。The is signaled when the asynchronous call completes, and you can wait for it by calling the method. 此示例由两个类组成： 包含以异步方式调用的方法和包含的类的类`Main`进行调用的方法。The example consists of two classes: the class that contains the method that is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关详细信息和使用委托来以异步方式调用方法的更多示例，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/waithandle.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/waithandle.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/WaitHandle.vb#3)]

para.span: 实现的对象不需要创建直到属性为只读。

span.span: The object that implements does not need to create the until the property is read.
It is the choice of the implementer.

para.span: 但是，如果创建了实施者，它负责实施者发出信号，将终止在适当的时间等待。

span.span: However, if the implementer creates , it is the responsibility of the implementer to signal the that will terminate the wait at the appropriate time.

para.span: 例如，以异步方式调用的方法返回时终止代表调用方等待。

span.span: For example, terminates the wait on behalf of the caller when an asynchronously invoked method returns.

para.span: 创建之后，应保持活动状态直至用户调用结束异步操作的方法。

span.span: Once created, should be kept alive until the user calls the method that concludes the asynchronous operation.

para.span: 之后的对象的 at可以丢弃。

span.span: At that time the object behind can be discarded.

para.span: 等待操作完成 （而不是轮询） 的客户端使用此属性以获取要等待的同步对象。

span.span: Clients that wait for the operation to complete (as opposed to polling) use this property to obtain a synchronization object to wait on.

para.span: 当你使用方法的委托来以异步方式调用一个方法，并从生成中获取的等待句柄，我们建议你关闭等待句柄，只要您在使用，通过调用完方法。

span.span: When you use the method of a delegate to call a method asynchronously and obtain a wait handle from the resulting , we recommend that you close the wait handle as soon as you are finished using it, by calling the method.

para.span: 如果只需释放对等待句柄的所有引用，垃圾回收回收的等待句柄，但垃圾回收工作效率更高时显式关闭或释放可释放对象时，将释放系统资源。

span.span: If you simply release all references to the wait handle, system resources are freed when garbage collection reclaims the wait handle, but garbage collection works more efficiently when disposable objects are explicitly closed or disposed.

para.span: 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。

span.span: For more information, see the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CompletedSynchronously As Boolean
public: property bool CompletedSynchronously { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示异步操作是否同步完成。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the asynchronous operation completed synchronously.

value.span: 如果异步操作同步完成，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在调用同步完成中检测到很可能启动异步操作的线程是当前线程的委托。If the synchronous completion of the call is detected in the delegate, it is probable that the thread that initiated the asynchronous operation is the current thread.

para.span: 大多数的实施者接口将不使用此属性，并应返回。

span.span: Most implementers of the interface will not use this property and should return .

para.span: 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，使用创建的任务方法将无法完成，如果此属性的实现不正确。

span.span: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], a task that is created with the method will not complete if this property is not implemented correctly.

para.span: 请参阅[4.5 中的应用程序兼容性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/application-compatibility-in-the-net-framework-4-5.md)。

span.span: See [Application Compatibility in 4.5](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/application-compatibility-in-the-net-framework-4-5.md).

para.span: 使用此属性以确定异步操作以同步方式完成。

span.span: Use this property to determine if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously.

para.span: 例如，此属性可返回如果是小型 I/O 请求的异步 I/O 操作。

span.span: For example, this property can return for an asynchronous I/O operation if the I/O request was small.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCompleted As Boolean
public: property bool IsCompleted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示异步操作是否已完成。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the asynchronous operation has completed.

value.span: 如果操作完成则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the operation is complete; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性是`true`，可以认为它是安全地放弃由异步操作分配供使用的任何资源。When this property is `true`, you can assume it is safe to discard any resources you allocate for use by the asynchronous operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性的来发现异步调用何时完成。The following example shows how to use the property of the to discover when an asynchronous call completes. 在这种情况下，通过使用进行异步调用`BeginInvoke`委托的方法。In this case, the asynchronous call is made by using the `BeginInvoke` method of a delegate. 可以使用属性来轮询完成时进行从线程的异步调用的服务的用户界面。You might use the property to poll for completion when making the asynchronous call from a thread that services the user interface. 对完成情况进行轮询允许在 线程中执行异步调用时继续执行调用线程。Polling for completion allows the calling thread to continue executing while the asynchronous call executes on a thread. 此示例由两个类组成： 包含以异步方式调用的方法和包含的类的类`Main`进行调用的方法。The example consists of two classes: the class that contains the method that is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关详细信息和使用委托来以异步方式调用方法的更多示例，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/polling.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/polling.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/polling.vb#4)]

para.span: 实施者通常将此属性的值作为返回私有字段或内部测试的值。

span.span: Implementers will typically return the value of a private field or internal test as the value of this property.

para.span: 轮询操作状态 （而不是等待同步对象） 的客户端使用此属性以确定操作的状态。

span.span: Clients that poll for operation status (as opposed to waiting on a synchronization object) use this property to determine the status of the operation.
